About Me

I'm Saima Jabeen, a dedicated professional with extensive experience in sales and brand promotions across the UAE. With a Dubai Residency Visa and over 10 years of experience, I bring expertise in customer service and event management.

I've worked with major brands including Versace Perfumes, Shan Brand, London Dairy Ice Cream, and participated in various media productions and promotional events across Dubai.

My focus is on delivering exceptional customer service and representing brands with professionalism and dedication.
